steps: 1. Configure Azure Speech Services API key in RAPP Settings
2. Select your Azure region (must match your resource)
3. Copy order_verification_agent.py to RAPP agents/ directory
4. Restart RAPP (the Live Order Taking button appears automatically)
5. Click the shopping cart icon in the header to start
6. Speak your order naturally - AI provides real-time feedback
